problem_text_cn: 如图,AB与⊙O目切于点B,连接AO,AO的延长线交⊙O于点C,连接BC,若∠A=40°,则∠C的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB and ⊙O are tangent to point B, connecting AO, and the extended line  of AO intersects ⊙O at point C, connecting BC, if ∠A = N_0, then the degree of ∠C is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图:连接OB,∵AB与⊙O相切于点B,∴∠OBA=90°,∵∠A=40°,∴∠AOB=50°,∵OB=OC,∴∠C=∠OBC,∵∠AOB=∠C+∠OBC=2∠C,∴∠C=25°．故选:B．
